example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 原本)) (VP (VV 想) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 听听) (NP-OBJ (NN 天籁))))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (PN 我))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 只好)) (VP (PU 『) (VV 离家出走) (PU 』))))
